attributes.action: Call For A General Election Now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With all the resignations of MP's over the expensive scam, we the public have a right to vote for a new parliment now instead of the government calling on when the public have no confidance in the house of parliment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
